definitions.text: write out from speech, notes, etc.
examples: Transcribe the oral history of this tribe
The Sanskrit text had to be transliterated

definitions.text: rewrite or arrange a piece of music for an instrument or medium other than that originally intended

examples: The anthropologist transcribed the sentences of the native informant

definitions.text: convert the genetic information in (a strand of DNA) into a strand of RNA, especially messenger RNA
